name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-m365-roadmap-tracker
title: The M365 Roadmap Features Tracker agent shows how users can easily stay up to date with the latest Microsoft 365 roadmap features.
shortDescription: The M365 Roadmap Features Tracker agent shows how users can easily stay up to date with the latest Microsoft 365 roadmap features. It integrates a Microsoft Graph Connector to monitor and deliver the latest updates, offering a hands-free solution for staying informed.
longDescription: The M365 Roadmap Features Tracker agent shows how users can easily stay up to date with the latest Microsoft 365 roadmap features.
